properties.name: swallow.sync.http.retry-delay-time
properties.description: HTTP long rotation fail retry delay time in milliseconds.

properties.name: swallow.sync.http.fail-delay-time
properties.description: HTTP long rotation retry fail delay time in seconds.

properties.name: swallow.sync.http.connection-timeout
properties.description: Set the http connect timeout in milliseconds.

properties.name: swallow.sync.http.read-timeout
properties.description: Set the http read timeout in milliseconds.

properties.name: swallow.sync.http.max-retry
properties.description: Number of retries failed in HTTP long rotation.
